overview: Barbie Sins may be a sexy office lady by day, but this British bombshell is a demanding dominatrix by night and she invites two male colleagues over to her dungeon for some BDSM fun. Blonde stunner Cherry Kiss goes through a breakup with her lover. Is there a better way to deal with the pain than releasing tension through some Hardcore BDSM fucking? Gina looks like the innocent girl-next-door while out on what seems like an innocent date with David Perry, but once he introduces her to Master Yanick Shaft, the horny submissive slut in her comes out.
title: Curiously Kinky
